Name: Presidente

Name: Presidente
Review Text: This is the worst pizza place to order from. I ordered pizza during midnight and the place is open till 1 a.m. they accepted the order but did not deliver. They showed the expected delivery time as 1:45 and yet there was no delivery. Never order from here.
